segments.text: Excuse me . Where is the Beijing railway station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take the subway to get there
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will I take it to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It â€™ s takes only about 10 minutes
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I take a bus or a taxi to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take No . 1 bus or taxi
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excuse me . Sir . Where is the No . 1 bus stop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pleas turn right at the traffic lights .
segments.speaker: S2
